attributes.action: Congratulate Alex Salmond Scotlands First Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is an insult to every Scot, that Blair, as head of the UK Government has not had the decency to congratulate our democratically elected First Minister, Alex Salmond.
 How dare he... Our Scottish soldiers are good enough to fight and die in Iraq but our First Minister is not even good enough to speak to. This is an appalling disgrace and a slight to every Scot.
 Sign here if you would like to see Blair belatedly, congratulate Alex Salmond.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Salmond/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
